channel.title: New Styles
channel.description:
On my server all the dragons and monsters are the only cardbordy looking npc's ..... is there any way i can change them to the new looking npc's...? if so , how would i do so....
thanks

item.title: New Styles
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

You can import models into your client of the new npc’s, but it would look even worse as they have no animation and basically stand up straight, as no animations will work with it.

Read full topic

item.title: New Styles
item.dc:creator: @santaher0 santaher0
item.description:
@santaher0 wrote:

just dump the new models into your class 8 (client)

Correct me if I’m wrong

Read full topic

item.title: New Styles
item.dc:creator: @nathan0507 nathan0507
item.description:
@nathan0507 wrote:

cough dude at my level…!!!,…

right then lets prove somthing …,
i own 3 servers,
i am admin on about 7 others,
mod on 12 servers
and co-owner on 2…
i am a coder for 3 servers aswell so lol my level is prety good to be at :D…
… but anyway i only need the models so i can put on my client…

Read full topic

item.title: New Styles
item.dc:creator: @ilovelamp ilovelamp
item.description:
@ilovelamp wrote:

[quote=“nathan0507, post:6, topic:239944”]i have my own client for my server …

do you no how i download new models?[/quote]
it would be easier just to download someone else’s client, at your level it would probably be just a huge waste of time, you could end up spending 8 hours on it and it would still not work.

Read full topic

to make out of a chicken an new npc like an 10 head dragon or something you need an model edit programm. i forgot the name but it was something like matasqui ?
